pageProduct.name: Wagner Vitamin C 500 Chewable 500 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

With regular use may help to reduce the duration of colds
Supports healthy immune system function
Helps to maintain a healthy cardiovascular system
Supports collagen formation
Assists with skin healing and repair

Features
Vitamin C is well known for its use in immune support and is essential for the proper function of the immune system.
This antioxidant nutrient also aids collagen production, supports healthy skin and connective tissue formation, helps to maintain a healthy cardiovascular system and supports iron absorption.
This formula provides a convenient dose of Vitamin C in a great-tasting, orange flavoured chewable tablet.

Warnings

Always read the label; take only as directed.
Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
Not to be used in children under two years of age without medical advice.

Formulated without:
Gluten, wheat, animal products, dairy products, egg, soy, artificial flavours, or preservatives.

Directions

Chew 2 tablets daily or as directed by your healthcare professional.
